statements: DELETE FROM WildlifePopulationData WHERE species = 'Tiger' AND location = 'Forest';
DELETE FROM WildlifePopulationData WHERE id = 1 AND species = 'Lion';
DELETE FROM WildlifePopulationData WHERE species = 'Elephant' AND population_count > 1000;
DELETE FROM habitat_preservation_data WHERE protected_area = TRUE;
DELETE FROM wildlife_population_data WHERE id = 101 AND population_size < 5000;
DELETE FROM habitat_preservation_data WHERE protected_area = TRUE AND location = 'Forest';
DELETE FROM ConservationEfforts WHERE conservation_program = 'Reforestation Program'
DELETE FROM WildlifePopulations WHERE species_name = 'Tiger' AND habitat_type = 'Forest'
